summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2842, for the improvement of Pike Street from First Avenue to Seventh Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by resurfacing the same with brick or with an asphalt top to be placed upon the existing brick pavement; under Ordinance No. 34281 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
